post.author: Springheel
post.body: I'd like to take two different uvmaps and combine the data into a single one. I haven't found any way to cut and paste uv coordinates, however, and I don't want to have to recreate the map from scratch. Anyone know of a method for cutting and pasting in LW8.0?

post.author: Springheel
post.body: Just in case anyone else is looking for this answer, you can select the relevant polys, hit F8 to bring up the map window, and Copy Vertex Map. If you type in the name of an existing map, it will copy those polys there and you can delete the old one.
